dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5642 IH: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to modify the eligibility disqualification for certain convicted felons.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Reed introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to modify the eligibility disqualification for certain convicted felons.

section.text: Section 6(r)(1) of the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 (7 U.S.C. 201(r)(1)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in clause (v) by striking clause (i), (ii), or (iii) and inserting subparagraph (A), (B), or (C), and
by redesignating clauses (i), (ii), (iii), (iv), and (v) as subparagraphs (A), (B), (C), (D), and (E), respectively,

paragraph.text: by striking if_(A) and inserting if, and
by moving the left margin of subparagraphs (A), (B), (C), (D), and (E), as so redesignated, 2 ems to the left.
